title: 'Kamala You Are Fired', Says Trump As Race For White House Remained Tight
content: The latest CNN polls showed that Harris has a narrow advantage in Michigan and Wisconsin, while she and Trump remain tied in Pennsylvania.
summary: The latest CNN polls showed that Harris has a narrow advantage in Michigan and Wisconsin, while she and Trump remain tied in Pennsylvania.

title: Russia Says It Launched Over 2,000 Drones At Ukraine In October
content: Russia launched more than 2,000 attack drones at civilian and military targets across Ukraine last month, Kyiv's military said on Friday, as Kremlin forces press a grinding offensive on the front line of their February 2022 invasion.
summary: Russia launched more than 2,000 attack drones at civilian and military targets across Ukraine last month, Kyiv's military said on Friday, as Kremlin forces press a grinding offensive on the front line of their February 2022 invasion.

title: False Claims About Voter Fraud Raises Concern Of Trump Contesting Results
content: False claims about voter fraud in Pennsylvania have raised concerns that former Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump may once again seek to overturn the vote there or in other battleground states likely to determine the winner next Tuesday.
summary: False claims about voter fraud in Pennsylvania have raised concerns that former Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump may once again seek to overturn the vote there or in other battleground states likely to determine the winner next Tuesday.

title: Hit Nigerian TV Show Raises Awareness On Population Challenges In Africa
content: The popular Nigerian TV show has stirred discussions on family planning across Africa, highlighting the challenges of raising large families.
summary: The popular Nigerian TV show has stirred discussions on family planning across Africa, highlighting the challenges of raising large families.

title: Trump, Harris Hold Duel Campaign In Wisconsin With High Stakes, Star Power
content: Donald Trump and Kamala Harris hold dueling campaign rallies Friday in Wisconsin's largest city Milwaukee, as both candidates make frantic last-ditch appeals to wavering voters with Election Day just around the corner.
summary: Donald Trump and Kamala Harris hold dueling campaign rallies Friday in Wisconsin's largest city Milwaukee, as both candidates make frantic last-ditch appeals to wavering voters with Election Day just around the corner.

title: This Word Is Named As 'Word Of The Year' By Collins Dictionary. It Is...
content: Brat, the word redefined by singer Charli XCX and adopted by supporters of US presidential candidate Kamala Harris, was on Friday named the Collins Word of the Year 2024.
summary: Brat, the word redefined by singer Charli XCX and adopted by supporters of US presidential candidate Kamala Harris, was on Friday named the Collins Word of the Year 2024.

title: UN Report Wars Of Famine, Aggravated By Conflicts And Climate Shocks
content: Severe food crises threaten people in vulnerable areas, including the Palestinian territories, Sudan, South Sudan, Haiti, and Mali, where populations face or near famine, says a report by the United Nations' food agencies released on Thursday.
summary: Severe food crises threaten people in vulnerable areas, including the Palestinian territories, Sudan, South Sudan, Haiti, and Mali, where populations face or near famine, says a report by the United Nations' food agencies released on Thursday.

title: Indian Man Asks Selena Gomez to Chant 'Jai Shri Ram'. Her Reaction
content: A recent video capturing an unusual interaction between an Indian man and pop star Selena Gomez has ignited a flurry of reactions online.
summary: A recent video capturing an unusual interaction between an Indian man and pop star Selena Gomez has ignited a flurry of reactions online.

title: Britain Has Banned Protests Outside Abortion Clinics
content: A British ban on protesting outside abortion clinics went into effect on Thursday, though it left a question mark over whether anti-abortion demonstrators who pray silently will be breaking the law.
summary: A British ban on protesting outside abortion clinics went into effect on Thursday, though it left a question mark over whether anti-abortion demonstrators who pray silently will be breaking the law.

title: "Israel's Attacks Suggest Rejection Of Ceasefire": Lebanon Prime Minister
content: Lebanon's Prime Minister Najib Mikati on Friday criticised Israel's "expansion" of its attacks on his country, saying they indicated a rejection of efforts to broker a truce after more than a month of war.
summary: Lebanon's Prime Minister Najib Mikati on Friday criticised Israel's "expansion" of its attacks on his country, saying they indicated a rejection of efforts to broker a truce after more than a month of war.

title: Shootout Linked To Drug Trafficking Injures Five In France
content: A massive shootout linked to drug trafficking has left a teenager and four others seriously wounded in western France, Interior Minister Bruno Retailleau said.
summary: A massive shootout linked to drug trafficking has left a teenager and four others seriously wounded in western France, Interior Minister Bruno Retailleau said.

title: To Define Herself, Harris Looks To Her Mother Who Moved To US From India
content: In each important speech she makes, Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris speaks about one woman first and foremost: her late mother.
summary: In each important speech she makes, Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris speaks about one woman first and foremost: her late mother.

title: Hindu Americans Back Trump's Promise to Safeguard Global Hindu Interests
content: In his Diwali greetings on Thursday, Trump strongly "condemned the barbaric violence against Hindus, Christians, and other minorities in Bangladesh", which he said remains in a "total state of chaos."
summary: In his Diwali greetings on Thursday, Trump strongly "condemned the barbaric violence against Hindus, Christians, and other minorities in Bangladesh", which he said remains in a "total state of chaos."

title: This International Airport Has Never Lost A Bag In 30 Years Of Operation
content: The airport says it has never lost a suitcase, a set of golf clubs, a stroller or anything in fact -- a feat its employees humbly shrug off as nothing special.
summary: The airport says it has never lost a suitcase, a set of golf clubs, a stroller or anything in fact -- a feat its employees humbly shrug off as nothing special.

title: Trump Unstable, Obsessed With Revenge, Consumed With Grievance: Harris
content: Former President Donald Trump is becoming increasingly unstable, obsessed with revenge and is out for unchecked power, Vice President Kamala Harris said.
summary: Former President Donald Trump is becoming increasingly unstable, obsessed with revenge and is out for unchecked power, Vice President Kamala Harris said.

title: Mauritius Bans Social Media Untll Elections End After Wire-Tapping Scandal
content: A scandal broke out earlier this month in Mauritius when secret recordings of phone calls by politicians, journalists, members of civil society and even foreign diplomats were leaked online.
summary: A scandal broke out earlier this month in Mauritius when secret recordings of phone calls by politicians, journalists, members of civil society and even foreign diplomats were leaked online.

title: "No Respect...": Kamala Harris Slams Trump's "Offensive" Remark On Women
content: Kamala Harris on Thursday slammed Donald Trump for "very offensive" remarks about women as she pressed her case that his misogyny has no place in 21st century America, just days ahead of a nail-biter election.
summary: Kamala Harris on Thursday slammed Donald Trump for "very offensive" remarks about women as she pressed her case that his misogyny has no place in 21st century America, just days ahead of a nail-biter election.

title: Turban-Wearing, Smiling Australian PM Celebrates Bandi Chhor Divas
content: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese wished the Sikhs on Bandi Chhor Divas and visited a gurdwara in Glenwood.
summary: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese wished the Sikhs on Bandi Chhor Divas and visited a gurdwara in Glenwood.

title: NASA's Rover Captures 'Googly Eye' Eclipse On Mars - Watch
content: The potato-shaped Martian moon was passing directly between the Sun and a point on the surface of Mars
summary: The potato-shaped Martian moon was passing directly between the Sun and a point on the surface of Mars

title: Microsoft Hires Meta's Former Engineering Head Jay Parikh
content: Microsoft Corp, which is struggling to bring data centers online fast enough to meet the demand for its artificial intelligence products, hired one of the engineering chiefs who kept Facebook's infrastructure humming.
summary: Microsoft Corp, which is struggling to bring data centers online fast enough to meet the demand for its artificial intelligence products, hired one of the engineering chiefs who kept Facebook's infrastructure humming.
